English: Hey! Did that Digimon just bump into my Woodmon?!
Chinese:
喂！　你這混蛋！！
剛剛差點要撞上我的朽木獸了吧！？
Korean:
오우! 이 자식!!
지금 내 우드몬하고 부딪쳤겠다!?
German:
He! Hat dieses Digimon gerade mein Woodmon
angerempelt?!

English: Yeah!
Chinese: 就是說啊，就是說啊──！
German: Ja!

English: I'm sorry! It was an accident.
Chinese:
對、對不起……！
我沒有好好看路……
Korean:
죄, 죄송합니다……!
앞을 제대로 안 보는 바람에……
German: Tut mir leid! Das war keine Absicht.

English: You should look where you're going!
Chinese: 你眼睛是長到哪裡去了啊！　喂混帳！
Korean: 네놈은 어디다 눈을 달고 다니는 거냐! 짜샤!
German: Pass doch auf, wo du hinläufst!

English: Yeah!
Chinese: 就是說啊，就是說啊──！
German: Ja!

English: Eek! I said I'm sorry. Please forgive me!
Chinese:
咿、咿！
我不是已經道歉了嗎，就原諒我了吧！
German:
Aaah! Ich hab mich doch entschuldigt. Bitte
verzeih mir!

English:
Nah, you need to learn your lesson. Woodmon,
attack! Make it pay!
Chinese:
你這傢伙根本沒在反省吧……？
朽木獸，上！　揍到他願意反省為止！
Korean:
아니이, 너는 반성하지 않았잖아……?
우드몬, 해치워! 반성할 때까지 혼내줘!
German:
Nö, du brauchst eine Lektion. Woodmon, zum
Angriff! Zahl es ihm heim!

English: Eek!
German: Aaah!

English: What are you doing here, eh?! Get out of here!
Chinese:
你這傢伙在幹麼啊……
是這傢伙的夥伴嗎？　啊啊！？
給我滾開！！
Korean:
넌 뭐야…… 이 녀석의 동료냐? 아앙!?
거기서 비켜!!
German: Was machst du denn hier, hm?! Verschwinde!

English: Oh, so you want some too, huh?!
Chinese:
哦～我懂了我懂了……
你是想一起被揍吧，啊啊！？
Korean:
호오~ 그런가 그런가……
같이 혼내줬으면 하는 거구나, 아앙!?
German: Ach, du willst also auch eine Abreibung, was?!

English: Hehehe... Fine by me!
Chinese: 嘿嘿嘿……上吧上吧！
German: Hehehe ... Mir soll’s recht sein!

English: Gaomooon!
German: Gaomooon!

English: Huh? How many of you are there?
Chinese:
……啊啊？
不要一直出現打擾的傢伙啊！
German: Was? Zu wievielt seid ihr eigentlich?

English: You're like a swarm of flies!
Chinese:
跟蟲一樣不停聚集出現
……很煩人啊！！
German: Ihr seid ja wie ein Fliegenschwarm!

English: Urgh!
German: Argh!

English: Ga-Gaomon! Really? Even after what I said?
Chinese:
迦、迦奧獸……！
竟然為了我這種人……還……！！
German:
Ga-Gaomon! Bist du sicher? Nach allem, was ich
gesagt habe?

English: Get outta here!
Chinese: 喂，給我滾開！！　啊啊！？
German: Verzieh dich!

English: Urgh... Argh...
German: Urgh ... Argh ...

English: Come on, Gaomon! Let's fight and save Betamon!
Chinese:
迦奧獸，我們上吧！
一起戰鬥把比特獸給救出來吧！
Korean:
가오몬, 갑시다!
싸워서 베타몬을 지켜주는 검다!
German: Komm, Gaomon! Kämpfen wir und retten wir Betamon!

English:
I'm Yasu from the Rebels! Anyone who picks on
Digimon will have to answer to me!
Chinese:
……我是反叛者的阿康！！
欺負數碼寶貝的壞人，我就是你的對手！
Korean:
……나는 리벨리온즈의 야스!!
디지몬을 괴롭히는 나쁜 놈은 내가 상대한다!
German:
Ich bin Yasu von den Rebels! Jeder, der sich mit
Digimon anlegt, bekommt es mit mir zu tun!

English: I'm gonna enjoy this! Come on! Bring it!
Chinese:
你的對手是我！
給我趕快上！！
German: Das wird ein Spaß! Na los! Trau dich!

English:
Go for it, Yasu! 
You'd better not run away!
Chinese:
加油啊，阿康！
……不行逃走啊！
German:
Mach schon, Yasu!
Lauf nicht davon!
